Reviews.Title: Cheap Camera Bag
Reviews.Author: Jason Bignell
Reviews.Content: Good camera, good (brand name accessories) but cheap camera bag. Also, the screen protectors are NOT static cling, but use an adhesive.Plan on ordering a new camera bag, some new screen protectors, and some extra batteries and you've got a great deal on an entry level DSLR with a couple good starter lenses.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera.
Reviews.Author: Nicole Romans
Reviews.Content: This is the very first camera I have ever owned and I am 100% satisfied with it. It is SUPER easy to use. I have been having a lot of fun with is, it is also easy to use.

Reviews.Title: NOT AGAIN
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The camera and lenses are as expected, but the bundle is belowacceptable. Both tripods are shakey, the 2x telephoto does not work,and the camera bag is flimsey. I would only buy the camera and lensif I would do this again.

Reviews.Title: CANON EOS REBEL T3I GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Debra Harden
Reviews.Content: I LOVE IT ,THE CAMERA HAS SO MANY CAP. IT DOSE EVERYTHING I NEED IT TO DO THANK YOU SO MUCH.

Reviews.Title: New to photography
Reviews.Author: Thomas "TheOldWolf"
Reviews.Content: I'm new to photography so my son told me to buy Canon and this is the perfect kit to go with got it on time and has almost all you need !

Reviews.Title: Good Camera & Lenses, the rest needs fine-tuning
Reviews.Author: B. Armstrong "BA"
Reviews.Content: Camera and lenses are great and as described... The accessories are sort of a mixed bag though.The filters and extra lenses seem good. The filters come in a rigid protective case and the extra lenses have bags and caps to keep them safe. They seem like decent quality, though I haven't used them much. The SD cards are class 10. The remote shutter control works and is compact.The big tripod is a bit unstable, though passable if using it with the shutter remote and it's not being used with a lot of movement around it. It comes with its own bag and is light and compact. The flash is cheap, but does have slave functions and would work best as a slave flash with a diffuser with a better flash on the camera itself. It does have a tripod mount too, so maybe that's a use for this wobbly tripod or the tiny table top thing.I would have paid a few bucks more for a half decent bag, this one is garbage. It's too small with no pockets or pouches and it is barely padded. The table top tripod is so tiny I'm not going to risk even trying it with this camera. I have no idea why this SD card wallet thing even exists, I guess to try to make up for a junk bag that has no pockets. I would rather dig through the bag looking for loose SD cards than use this thing...Haven't used the cleaning kit or the screen protector. The latter I probably won't use. Both seem generic but passable.Overall I think this is an OK value. The bag is worthless, so just order a new one with this purchase. Maybe just use this bag to store the mini tripod, the card wallet, and the screen protectors...

Reviews.Title: great camera lots of unnecessary stuff
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: i love the camera! takes great pictures, and the lenses focus rather fast. alot of what comes with it isnt needed or is junky. both tripods went in my trash. but it wasnt a bad price so it didnt bother me any

Reviews.Title: perfect purchase
Reviews.Author: Walter Liberman
Reviews.Content: It's my first experience with this type of camera and turned very good, the combo is perfect. Now to take advantage

Reviews.Title: Canon camera kit
Reviews.Author: Nan
Reviews.Content: Everything is perfect, what a great value, except for the cheap camera bag. For the price I think a signature should be required, I opened the front door to get the paper and it was on the porch.

ProductInfo.Features:
This Photo4Less Top Value Camera and Lens With USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied Accessories Kit includes
Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera - Canon Zoom Wide Angle-Normal EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Autofocus Lens - Canon Zoom Telephoto EF 75-300mm f/4.0-5.6 III Autofocus Lens
58mm 2X Professional Telephoto Lens - High Definition 58mm Wide Angle Lens - Digital DSLR Auto Power Slave Flash - Transcend 16GB Class 10 SDHC Card -Transcend 8 GB Class 10 SDHC Flash Memory Card
50" Photo Video Quality Tripod - Water Resistant Shock Proof Camcorder & SLR Camera Case - RC-6 Wireless Remote Control - 3 Piece Filter Kit (UV-CPL-FLD) 58mm - 58mm Ultraviolet UV Protector Filter
Hi-Speed SD USB Card Reader - Camera & Lens 3 Piece Cleaning Kit - Tri-fold Memory Card Wallet - LCD Screen Protectors (Clear) - Table Top Tripod - PHOTO4LSS CLEANING CLOTH
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera USA warranty with canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS [Image Stabilizer] II Zoom Lens & EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens + 58mm 2x Professional Lens +High Definition 58mm Wide Angle Lens + Auto Power Flash + UV Filter Kit with 24GB Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle
